name: @vlsergey/react-bootstrap-array-pagination
description: React Bootstrap component to build pagination for array of items

scripts.eslint:check: eslint --ignore-pattern "!.eslintrc.js" .eslintrc.js karma.conf.js src/**/*.ts src/**/*.tsx test/**/*.js test/**/*.tsx
scripts.eslint:fix: eslint --ignore-pattern "!.eslintrc.js" --fix .eslintrc.js karma.conf.js src/**/*.ts src/**/*.tsx test/**/*.js test/**/*.tsx
scripts.test:watch:chrome: cross-env NODE_ENV=development karma start karma.conf.js --no-single-run --browsers Chrome
scripts.preversion: npm run eslint:fix && npm test && npm run clean && npm run build

author: Sergey Vladimirov <vlsergey@gmail.com>
